name: iron-barbs

effect.x_y: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage. This ability functions identically to rough skin.

short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.x_y: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
